title: Warner in the wild
creator_credit: David Gray, Wendy Campbell and Greenway Films
brief_description: Follows the band “Dave Warner From the Suburbs” as it tours around the far northwest of Australia, suffering the heat and hardships of such a trip. Incorporates some of Warner’s most popular songs as well as providing comments by Warner as to the content of his lyrics, which portray suburban living and the Australian character, as no other Australian songwriter has done. Suitable for secondary level.
